name: Operation Zombie
description:
So, hi again :D

I'm proud to announce that I made great progress. This time I went to 3D, yeiiii :D So yes, this is my first project in 3D. 

I have plans to continue developing it. Maybe add more effects, more levels, more mechanics, a background story, an inventory system, polish some already existing mechanics and the character movement system, and the list goes on and on.

So please, feel free to give me any aideas or feedback you have, it will be well received.
